page.title: 10SCHOOLS CARETAKER ON CLIFTON
page.content: These are a caretaker's views on his job looking after three schools in Clifton.The schools are all{Primary {Schools}and are all on one campus. He finds that all the people he meets in his job are generally nice to him.On the whole the children keep the schools tidy but there are a few break-ins and there is a small amount of vandalism.He finds few problems with dogs. On average he works about nine hours each day,six days a week.He finds there is a lot to do but he enjoys his work and feels that the job is secure.He says his pay is alright for the job. In the future he thinks his job will be done away with and that contractors will be brought in to do the work.
